thread.title: Jeff Gordon gets final race at Charlotte Motor Speedway
thread.title_full: Jeff Gordon gets final race at Charlotte Motor Speedway

author: JENNA FRYER
title: Jeff Gordon gets final race at Charlotte Motor Speedway
text:
Terry Renna Title contenders eyeing win at Charlotte to ease pressure 
Jeff Gordon looks from the garage before practice for Saturday's NASCAR Sprint Cup series auto race at Charlotte Motor Speedway in Concord, N.C., Friday, Oct. 9, 2015. (AP Photo/Terry Renna) Mike McCarn Jeff Gordon gets final race at Charlotte Motor Speedway 
Jeff Gordon signs autographs before practice for Saturday's NASCAR Sprint Cup series auto race at Charlotte Motor Speedway in Concord, N.C., Friday, Oct. 9, 2015. (AP Photo/Mike McCarn) Mike McCarn Jeff Gordon gets final race at Charlotte Motor Speedway 
Jeff Gordon waits in the garage before practice for Saturday's NASCAR Sprint Cup series auto race at Charlotte Motor Speedway in Concord, N.C., Friday, Oct. 9, 2015. (AP Photo/Mike McCarn) Posted: Saturday, October 10, 2015 6:23 pm | Updated: 7:30 pm, Sat Oct 10, 2015. Jeff Gordon gets final race at Charlotte Motor Speedway Associated Press | 
CONCORD, N.C. (AP) — Jeff Gordon came to North Carolina in 1990 to participate in the Buck Baker Racing School at Rockingham Speedway. He used the trip to make a sightseeing break at Charlotte Motor Speedway. 
Gordon's only firsthand knowledge of a superspeedway was Indianapolis Motor Speedway, and he'd heard so much about the facility in Charlotte that he just had to take a look.
